_header: This book wrote William Thame / God keep him from sin and shame
Subjects: prayers, asked on behalf of scribes; scribes, prayers requested for

HunHM129.Transcription:
Þis boke wrot [William Thame]God kepe hym fro syn and
                    schameAnd gyff hym þe grace so to spedeþat he may haue heuyn
                    to his medeI pray ȝow þat hyt may so beFor hym say A pater
                    noster and A Aue
HunHM129.Note:
Followed by Latin line, ‘Celi regina sit scriptory
                    medicina’ and two further lines erased; immediately follows 6676.
HunHM129.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 253.
Dutschke,  C. W. 
             Guide to Medieval and Renaissance Manuscripts in the Huntington
                Library.
         2 vols. San Marino, CA: Huntington Library, 1989: 172.
